front.title: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Location Get Function

abstract.t: This document defines how a watcher seeks the geographic location information from presentity. SIP Location Conveyance defines how location is sent from one entity to another unsolicited. This document specifies how a watcher, i.e., a Location Target, requests for specific geolocation state information of a presentity, in addition to the details within the subscription such as the format (geo or civic) returned and the frequency of updated location from the presentity.
